title: Great Mosque of Djenne egg function

content.question: What purpose did the architect’s inclusion of ostrich eggs serve at the Great Mosque of Djenné?

choices.label: As a symbolic representation of fertility and purity
As a literal connection to the culture associated with the mosque
As a literal representation of an important food source
As a symbolic representation of the birth of Islam

content.answer: As a symbolic representation of fertility and purity

topic.text: 6.2: Purpose and Audience in African Art

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain how the possible intent, purpose, and/or function shape the creation or meaning of a work of art (or group of related works of art).
